'''1.8.2-pre6'''<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150329062446/https://mojang.com/2014/12/minecraft-1-8-2-pre1-christmas-gift-edition/|title=Minecraft 1.8.2-pre6 – Updated Christmas Gift Edition|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Searge]]}}</ref> is the sixth pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.8.2]], released on January 30, 2015.

|58184|Cocoa block texture bug.

|77021|Beacon shows additional glitchy beam.
|77028|Realms crashes to launcher on selecting PLAYERS button.
|77030|Crash when using a music disc.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This version was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
